End to end content syndication

Just set up the processes once and let them run

Ð¡hallenges you can solve with Gepard
Transformation of product information

Wherever you publish your product information, you always need to fulfill a wide range of requirements. These requirements differ, and basic mapping capabilities are not enough. We map content on the taxonomy level, using intelligent transformation algorithms

 Data aggregation from multiple sources

When you import product content from various channels, it needs to be adjusted. Data sources, either content providers or direct suppliers, use different data models and formats. We adapt all the required information to your needs automatically, with no efforts from your side.

 Data distribution to multiple channels

If you share your product descriptions with more than one sales channel, adjustments are assumed per each of them. We transform the product content into the taxonomy of the retail partners, syndicate and keep it up to date. No coding needed from the client's side.
How Does It Work
Import
Import your product information in a form of XML feeds, JSON, CSV, XLSX files via API, SFTP, HTTP and more
Map
Map your product content to meet the retail channels' requirements by yourself or rely on our editors
Enhance
Optionally add details to your product descriptions through a single product management interface
Distribute
Share the rich product data with your favourite marketing and sales channels automatically
What You Get with Gepard Content Syndication Software
Simplified content aggregation and delivery

Get content from multiple sources automatically

Faster time-to-market content cycle

Receive rich product content transformed into your data model

Content experts working by your side

Lower costs on/of maintenance

Data transformation examples

Gepard stands out from other content syndication platforms with its advanced data transformation capabilities, providing you with powerful and flexible product content syndication services

One product feature into several features ›

Example. Marketplace Long description data compilation from different marketing product fields (bullets, reasons to buy, etc) out of the Icecat data.

 Several product features into one feature ›

Example. Content source: Quantity of USB 2.0 = 1 Quantity of USB 3.0 = 4 Quantity of HDMi = 1. Output: (free text) 1 x USB 2.0, 4 x USB 3.0, 1 x HDMI.

 Conditional mapping & transformation ›

If a product from Content source has Category. A and attribute B it should go to category AB of a client. Example: Category = Cameras Attribute: Camera Type = Digital > Category Digital Cameras is assigned
